faq.title: FAQ
faq.joinGroup: Can't find your answer? Join our Telegram group

howToDownload.question: How to download?
howToDownload.answer: On the new page, click the three dots in the bottom right corner, then select download

cantOpen.question: Why can't I open the download link?
cantOpen.answer: The download link requires a clean node. Some nodes might be blocked. Try changing your node.

mobile.question: Can I use it on mobile?
mobile.answer: Yes, you can use it in your mobile browser. Just open the website in your browser, but you need proper network support.

ios.question: What if the video doesn't download directly on iOS?
ios.answer: Since Safari and WeChat browsers don't support direct downloads, you'll need a third-party app. You can use this tool: iPhone Video Download

noAudio.question: Why is there no sound in the downloaded video?
noAudio.answer: YouTube stores video and audio separately. You can download both and merge them using this tool: Jianying, code: 9876
